item.title: AWS Local Development with LocalStack
item.description: LocalStack provides an easy-to-use test/mocking framework for developing AWS applications. In this post, a web service will be used for demonstrating how to utilize LocalStack for development. Specifically a simple web service built with Flask-RestPlus is used. It supports simple CRUD operations against a database table. It is set that SQS and Lambda are used for creating and updating a record. When a POST or PUT request is made, the service sends a message to a SQS queue and directly returns 204 reponse.
